trans-unit.source: Represents a design-time editor sheet for the properties of a <see langword="RouteUrl" /> expression in the UI of a designer host at design time.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma folha de editor de tempo de design para as propriedades de uma expressão <see langword="RouteUrl" /> na interface do usuário de um host de designer em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The visual designer uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditor> class together with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet> class to select the individual properties of a `RouteUrl` expression, and to combine the selected expression property values into a `RouteUrl` expression.
trans-unit.target: Usa o designer visual a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditor> classe junto com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet> classe para selecionar as propriedades individuais de um `RouteUrl` expressão e combinar os valores de propriedade de expressão selecionada em um `RouteUrl` expressão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditor.GetExpressionEditorSheet%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet> object.
trans-unit.target: O método <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditor.GetExpressionEditorSheet%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> retorna um objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet>.

trans-unit.source: In the expressions dialog box, when you select a control property and bind it to a `RouteUrl` expression, the visual designer calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditor.GetExpressionEditorSheet%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Na caixa de diálogo expressões, quando você seleciona uma propriedade de controle e associá-lo para um `RouteUrl` expressão, o visual designer chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditor.GetExpressionEditorSheet%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The visual designer uses the returned <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet> object to prompt for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O designer visual usa retornado <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet> objeto para solicitar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Once the properties are selected, the visual designer calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.GetExpression%2A> method to combine the properties into a `RouteUrl` expression string.
trans-unit.target: Depois que as propriedades são selecionadas, o visual designer chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.GetExpression%2A> método para combinar as propriedades em um `RouteUrl` cadeia de caracteres de expressão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A> property must be specified if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A> property is not specified.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A> propriedade deve ser especificada se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A> propriedade não for especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A> property must be specified if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A> is not specified.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A> propriedade deve ser especificada se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A> não for especificado.

trans-unit.source: Both properties may be specified.
trans-unit.target: Ambas as propriedades podem ser especificadas.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="RouteUrl" /> expression, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.
trans-unit.target: Uma expressão <see langword="RouteUrl" />, usada para inicializar a folha de editor de expressão.

trans-unit.source: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.
trans-unit.target: Uma implementação do provedor de serviço fornecida pelo host do designer, usada para obter serviços de tempo de design adicionais.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet" />.

trans-unit.source: The initial <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A> property values are set using the input `expression` string.
trans-unit.target: Inicial <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A> valores de propriedade são definidos usando a entrada `expression` cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet.ServiceProvider%2A> property is set using the input `serviceProvider` implementation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet.ServiceProvider%2A> propriedade é definida usando a entrada `serviceProvider` implementação.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see langword="RouteUrl" /> expression that is formed by the expression editor sheet property values.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma expressão <see langword="RouteUrl" /> formada pelos valores de propriedade de folha do editor de expressão.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="RouteUrl" /> expression string for the current settings in the sheet.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres da expressão <see langword="RouteUrl" /> para as configurações atuais na folha.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see langword="RouteUrl" /> expression string is valid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a cadeia de caracteres da expressão <see langword="RouteUrl" /> é válida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see langword="RouteUrl" /> expression string is valid; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see langword="RouteUrl" /> cadeia de caracteres de expressão for válido; caso contrário <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the route that a URL is to be generated for.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome da rota para a qual uma URL será gerada.

trans-unit.source: The name of the route that a URL is to be generated for.
trans-unit.target: O nome da rota que é gerado para uma URL.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL parameter names and values that are to be used to generate a URL from a route.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os nomes e valores de parâmetro de URL que serão usados para gerar uma URL de uma rota.

trans-unit.source: The URL parameter names and values that are to be used to generate a URL from a route.
trans-unit.target: Os nomes de parâmetro de URL e valores que serão usados para gerar uma URL de uma rota.
